item.title: Messed my armour help please
item.dc:creator: @myspaceman123 myspaceman123
item.description:
@myspaceman123 wrote:

[quote=“sonsofgod2, post:1, topic:269464”]well i was trying to make a starter and i messed up so now when i use my top its my weapon when i use my ammy is my boots . Heres the codes i got atm

public int playerHat = 1;
public int playerCape = 2;
public int playerAmulet = 4;
public int playerWeapon = 3;
public int playerChest = 3;
public int playerShield = 3;
public int playerLegs = 5;
public int playerHands = 9;
public int playerFeet = 2;
public int playerRing = 12;
public int playerArrows = 13;

Please tell me how do i make it back default[/quote]

change that to this

public int playerHat = 1; public int playerCape = 2; public int playerAmulet = 3; public int playerWeapon = 4; public int playerChest = 5; public int playerShield = 6; public int playerLegs = 7; public int playerHands = 8; public int playerFeet = 9; public int playerRing = 10; public int playerArrows = 11;

that may be wrong if so just use this

public int playerHat = 0; public int playerCape = 0; public int playerAmulet = 0; public int playerWeapon = 0; public int playerChest = 0; public int playerShield = 0; public int playerLegs = 0; public int playerHands = 0; public int playerFeet = 0; public int playerRing = 0; public int playerArrows = 0;

and where it says for example playerfeet type the code of the boots
